result.arabic_text: لَهُمُ ٱلۡبُشۡرَىٰ فِي ٱلۡحَيَوٰةِ ٱلدُّنۡيَا وَفِي ٱلۡأٓخِرَةِۚ لَا تَبۡدِيلَ لِكَلِمَٰتِ ٱللَّهِۚ ذَٰلِكَ هُوَ ٱلۡفَوۡزُ ٱلۡعَظِيمُ
result.translation: 64. Ama awliya addunyâ manoo kee akeeral ruffu ken haytam (jannat kinnuk) aytikumah Ion, Yalli hee xagana mamakaay kay maxcooca korsa mali, toh is kaxxa maffaafay affaf как wadirit raaqewaa kinni.
